'''Treasure Map Fragment''' are [[Quest Items]] obtained through exploration in [[The Chasm]] and surrounding areas. These items are used in the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Lumenspar in the Den of Thieves]]''. Obtaining both fragments automatically converts them into [[Treasure Hoarders' Treasure Map]].
